item.title: MMM
item.description: score:-16 Chances: 3M Co. has reached record corporate dividends in 2023, largely due to substantial contributions from banks, indicating a strong financial performance. The appointment of aerospace veteran William Brown as the new CEO signals a potential fresh direction for the company, which may boost investor confidence.
